trans-unit.source: Provides properties that specify the appearance of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> controls whose <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat"></xref>.
Gets or sets the color of the border around the button.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure representing the color of the border around the button.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the size, in pixels, of the border around the button.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> representing the size, in pixels, of the border around the button.
Gets or sets the color of the client area of the button when the button is checked and the mouse pointer is outside the bounds of the control.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure representing the color of the client area of the button.
Gets or sets the color of the client area of the button when the mouse is pressed within the bounds of the control.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure representing the color of the client area of the button.
Gets or sets the color of the client area of the button when the mouse pointer is within the bounds of the control.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure representing the color of the client area of the button.
